Text:
Virus alert. Don't download. 

**Found Win32/KeyLogger.Ardamax application** 

Not only a trojan but also a keylogger! With this keylogger, this person will get your personal login informations and credit card / bank account details. Furthermore he will get everything you write on your computer; some keyloggers even send screenshots!
